# PaleoSpec

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/EarthSystemDiagnostics/paleospec/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/EarthSystemDiagnostics/paleospec?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

PaleoSpec is an R package to assist the analysis of variance and power spectra.


## Installation

You can install the development version of PaleoSpec from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("EarthSystemDiagnostics/paleospec")
```

## Usage


Please refer to function references here:

https://earthsystemdiagnostics.github.io/paleospec/reference/index.html
